name: pnp-powerplatform-prompts-ai-builder-feedback-classification
title: Feedback Classification Prompt
shortDescription: This prompt helps to designed to classify text from surveys, reviews, or any dialouge, and determine if the user is asking a question, offering a suggestion, or simply leaving a closed end comment.
longDescription: This prompt helps to designed to classify text from surveys, reviews, or any diologe, and determine if the user is asking a question, offering a suggestion, or simply leaving a closed end comment.
